segments.text: Could you help me figure out why I am missing my unemployment check for this week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope that you remembered to send in your last Continued Claim Form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am pretty sure that I didn ’ t send that claim form in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to send that form in every two weeks so we that we will know what to pay you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I mail it in late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If it is not more than fourteen days past its due date , then you may still mail it in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that I will mail it in right away when I get it next time , so I won ’ t be late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can ’ t mail it in early because you don ’ t know , in advance , how much you will be working .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even though I was late turning in my form , will my paycheck be late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , your check will be a little late in getting to you .
segments.speaker: S2
